text: Euspondylus excelsum is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is endemic to Peru. ==References== Category:Euspondylus Category:Reptiles of Peru Category:Endemic fauna of Peru Category:Reptiles described in 2017 Category:Taxa named by German Chavez Category:Taxa named by Alessandro Catenazzi Category:Taxa named by Pablo J. Venegas
title: Euspondylus excelsum
